g.text: R1 : when the set button is pressed
the system shall activate the alarm within 60 to 60
the system shall emit a tone within 0 to 0
the system shall enter in <TimedState: start time period , timing: within 0 to 300/>
R4 : while in <TimedState: inside time period , timing: within 0 to 300 [ scope ]( R3 )/>
the system shall turn off the tone within 0 to 0 [ goto ]( R1 )
R5 : while in <TimedState: inside time period , timing: within 0 to 300 [ scope ]( R3 )/>
the system shall turn off the tone within 0 to 0
R6 : while in <TimedState: inside time period , timing: within 0 to 300 [ scope ]( R3 )/>
upon turn off the tone [ ref ]( R5 ),
the system shall donothing [ goto ]( R1 )
the system shall enter in <TimedState: start time period , timing: within 0 to 60/>
R8 : while in <TimedState: inside time period , timing: within 0 to 60 [ scope ]( R7 )/>
R9 : while in <TimedState: inside time period , timing: within 0 to 60 [ scope ]( R7 )/>
the system shall alert the emergency center within 0 to 0 [ goto ]( R7 )
